articles.title: First Republic hires Lazard to explore options after share price tumbles - Financial Times
articles.description: US regional bank has been among the hardest hit in the fallout from Silicon Valley Bank’s collapse
articles.content:
First Republic has hired investment bank Lazard to help it explore strategic options after the lenders shares collapsed in the wake of the shuttering of Silicon Valley Bank.
